text:
SecurityConstraint.removeAuthRole(String authRole) doesn't not set boolean
'authConstraint' to false if no more roles.

see line 325 on org.apache.catalina.deploy.SecurityConstraint
creator: quartz12h@yahoo.com
yoavs@computer.org
text:
This is by design, as the comment for the authConstraint field says. 
authConstraint may be true without roles for the case of no access at all.
then why is it false until one adds roles?
creator: quartz12h@yahoo.com
